articles.author: Guy Chazan
articles.title: Ultra-orthodox draft exemption sharpens threat against Netanyahu government - Financial Times
articles.description: A court ruling freezing subsidies to yeshiva students has piled greater strain on Israel’s coalition
articles.content:
Yaakov Cohen shrugs off the prospect of a new law that will force young ultra-Orthodox men like him to abandon full-time study of Jewish scriptures and serve in the Israeli army.
I can promise you t… [+5961 chars]

articles.title: Ewan McGregor 'turned into his grandad' in new role - BBC.com
articles.description: The Scottish actor said the ageing process in A Gentleman in Moscow saw his relative emerge.
